name: Instagram Verification (NOT META!)
description:
After you place an order, you have no obligations, no need for press releases, no need for Google, Facebook, or any other panel.

We will prepare everything for you and have you Verified in 1-6 weeks at the most. (Most of the time within 6 days)

Professionals manually perform verification services 12 hours after your order is submitted. This is for the safety and satisfaction of our customers. If you put the wrong link in your order, for example, you should immediately open a ticket and notify us.

‚ö†Ô∏èAttention‚ö†Ô∏è
üìåWe have a 99% success rate, but if we fail to deliver the Verification badge for any reason, you are entitled to a full refund.
üìåRefunds are not available if you change your username or violate Instagram's TOS.

If you want to change your username, please raise a ticket and we will do it for a fee, which is usually between ‚Ç¨300 and ‚Ç¨2500 depending on the platform. If you have any doubts or questions, please raise a ticket in English.
